mixedgreen.name: Mixed Greens Salad
mixedgreen.desc: Mixed greens with fresh vegetables, and bread sticks. Choose from our homemade dressings: roasted garlic vinaigrette, honey mustard vinaigrette, ranch, or bleu cheese.

costamesa.name: Costa Mesa Salad
costamesa.desc: Warm bacon and mushrooms tossed with mixed greens & vinaigrette and topped with Gorgonzola.

lagunaseca.name: Laguna Seca Salad
lagunaseca.desc: Warm chicken and roasted peppers tossed with mixed greens & vinaigrette and topped with feta.

withsauce.desc: With bleu cheese dressing and red sauce

withcheese.desc: Smothered with melted mozzarella and served with red sauce
